krazconfig.visual.hideStatusEffects.desc: Hides status effects from showing from various places.
krazconfig.visual.inventory.hideRecipeBo: Hides the recipe book from the inventory.
krazconfig.visual.inventory.cancelSlotHi: Cancel Slot Highlighting When Tooltip Empty
Cancels the slot hightlighting of items without tooltips.
krazconfig.visual.inventory.cancelClicks: Cancel Clicks On Slot When Tooltip Empty
Cancels the clicks on slots with item without tooltips.
krazconfig.hypixel.achievementHelper.cus: A custom menu for achivement created for hypixel.
krazconfig.misc.ignoreSignatureErrors.de: Stops signature related errors from appearing in your logs.
